DOC.brief_summary: A Cross sectional observational Quality Assurance Project General Practice COPD Diagnosis Treatment
DOC.brief_title: General Practice Quality Assurance Project . Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease ( COPD ) Diagnosis Treatment
DOC.criteria: COPD patient 35 year age More two annual renewal follow group inhalation preparation : Anticholinergic , beta2 antagonist , steroid combination Asthma
